thread.section_title: fios.verizon.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of fios.verizon.com | fios.verizon.com
thread.title: Kathy

author: Kathy
title: Kathy
text: Justin and Greg really helped and explained a lot to me. I only hope that since I am switching from the other company that my bill does not go as sky high as it did. I was a customer for the other company for a very long time! Looking forward to seeing how this all goes. Customer service people have been so wonderful, kind and nice to deal with. Here's looking at a new beginning after all these years!
